## Visit Us

The Lab is located in **Atanasoff Hall** at the Iowa State University.

> **Street Address:** 2434 Osborn Dr , Ames, IA 50011

## Email Us

::: {=html}

<style>
  .contact-box{max-width:800px;margin-top:1rem;padding:1.5rem 2rem;border:1px solid #ddd;border-radius:8px;background:#fff;box-shadow:0 3px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.08);}
  .contact-form label{display:block;margin-top:1rem;font-weight:600;}
  .contact-form input,
  .contact-form select,
  .contact-form textarea{width:100%;padding:10px;border:1px solid #ccc;border-radius:4px;font-size:1rem;box-sizing:border-box;}
  .contact-form button{margin-top:1.2rem;background:#5b8dee;color:#fff;padding:10px 24px;border:none;border-radius:4px;cursor:pointer;font-size:1rem;}
  .contact-form button:hover{background:#467ad3;}
</style>

<div class="contact-box">

<form class="contact-form" action="https://formsubmit.co/kkumar@iastate.edu" method="POST">
  <!-- Redirect URL after success (optional) -->
  <input type="hidden" name="_next" value="https://your‑site.com/thanks.html">
  <!-- Disable CAPTCHA (optional) -->
  <input type="hidden" name="_captcha" value="false">

  <label>Name <span style="color:red">*</span>
    <input type="text" name="name" required>
  </label>

  <label>Email <span style="color:red">*</span>
    <input type="email" name="email" required>
  </label>

  <label>Subject
    <select name="subject">
      <option value="" disabled selected>— Select a topic —</option>
      <option>Research</option>
      <option>Resources</option>
      <option>Opportunities</option>
    </select>
  </label>

  <label>Message
    <textarea name="message" rows="6" required></textarea>
  </label>

  <button type="submit">Submit</button>
</form>

</div>

:::
